title: BRIEF-Credit Intelligence Receives Approval From Singapore Govt For Acquisition Of Stake In Hup Hoe Credit
text:
BRIEF-Credit Intelligence Receives Approval From Singapore Govt For Acquisition Of Stake In Hup Hoe Credit

Stock Markets Sep 05, 2019 10:10

© Reuters. BRIEF-Credit Intelligence Receives Approval From Singapore Govt For Acquisition Of Stake In Hup Hoe Credit Sept 5 (Reuters) - Credit Intelligence Ltd CI1.AX : * RECEIVED APPROVAL FROM SINGAPORE GOVERNMENT FOR ACQUISITION OF A MAJORITY 60% INTEREST IN HUP HOE CREDIT PTE LTD * CO WILL FUND PURCHASE THROUGH ISSUE OF SHARES AND CASH

BRIEF-Credit Intelligence Receives Approval From Singapore Govt For Acquisition Of Stake In Hup Hoe Credit
